Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation suggested by eyewitnesses, who claimed that the prosthetics came loose when a police officer grabbed the protester by his ankles.
Falters at times: The claim may falter at times due to conflicting accounts and lack of clear information about what happened after the amputee was pulled away by protesters.
